'''Sea pickle''' is a [[feature]] that places a cluster of [[sea pickle]] blocks in the [[warm ocean]] biome.

== Generation ==
Sea pickle colonies generate on the bottom of warm oceans and can also be found on top of [[coral block]]s in [[coral reef]]s. Each chunk has {{frac|1|6}} chance to generate sea pickle colonies. They can be found in groups of 1 up to 4.

{{block distribution|Sea Pickle}}
